description: This source file implements a file management module for the Broadway Web Resource Manager (BWRM). It provides functions to get, set, create, delete, and manage files on the filesystem, handling raw data read/write operations with support for compressed files. The functions allow manipulation of files specified by root and relative paths, with internal memory management and file access abstractions.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS BwrmFmoGetFile(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * root_path,char * file_path,void ** file_data,PULONG file_size)
methods.description: Retrieves raw data from a specified file identified by root and relative paths, returning the file data and size.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS BwrmFmoSetFile(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * root_path,char * file_path,void * file_data,ULONG file_size)
methods.description: Writes raw data into a specified file, overwriting existing content.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS BwrmFmoNewFile(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * root_path,char * file_path,void * file_data,ULONG file_size)
methods.description: Creates and writes raw data into a new file, with support for appending to existing files.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS BwrmFmoDelFile(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * root_path,char * file_path)
methods.description: Deletes the specified file identified by root and relative paths.
